Module com.cse.ai.othellogame
Package com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.mainmenu

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.mainmenu.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenu extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MainMenu class represents the main menu screen of the Othello game. It allows players to configure game settings such as player types (Human or AI), player names, and AI difficulty levels before starting a new game.

This class extends the JavaFX Pane class and implements the Initializable interface to initialize the GUI components defined in the corresponding FXML file.

The MainMenu class contains methods to handle user interactions, such as toggling player types between Humans and AI, changing AI difficulty levels, retrieving player names, and starting a new game with the selected settings.
